comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/factory-method-design-pattern-in-java/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.geeksforgeeks.org%2Ffactory-method-design-pattern-in-java%2F) ### Comment > Scrolling doesn't work if Adguard is enabled. When adguard is disabled, the page tries to show two pop ups. One asking to disable the adblocker (because I use Adguard DNS service) and the other one asking to create an account on this page. So, when the agduard extension is blocking ads, these two pop ups are not shown but the scrolling doesn't work. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/XfJUqy8.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/1XFAD4x.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.55 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
Adblock Warning Removal List,
Fanboy's Annoyances,
Web Annoyances Ultralist,
I don't care about cookies

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard Japanese

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.espncricinfo.com/series/indian-premier-league-2023-1345038/punjab-kings-vs-gujarat-titans-18th-match-1359492/match-preview](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.espncricinfo.com%2Fseries%2Findian-premier-league-2023-1345038%2Fpunjab-kings-vs-gujarat-titans-18th-match-1359492%2Fmatch-preview) ### Comment > Empty space left behind after blocking the ad. This should have been covered by high quality cosmetic filtering. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/TJIa8yS.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 13 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.11+(54) Browser: | Samsung Browser AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Self-destructing third-party cookies (0) DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns9.quad9.net:443/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt, DnsUserRules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
